entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9540] Assets with a value of 2,317,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 1,417,000,000 + 897,800,000 ) with a value of 2,314,800,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Assets : -5 Decimals of Current Assets : -5 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -5
Rule Element Id:9540 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/815600CC86D25A205563/2021-12-31/ESEF/NL/0/815600CC86D25A205563-2021-12-31.zip/815600CC86D25A205563-2021-12-31/reports/815600CC86D25A205563-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 640

[DQR.IFRS.0102.9540] Assets with a value of 1,822,400,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 1,012,800,000 + 809,200,000 ) with a value of 1,822,000,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Assets : -5 Decimals of Current Assets : -5 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -5

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9602] It is expected that SharePremium with a value of 24,000,000 reported in the network role https://www.aristongroup.com/role/FinancialStatement should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:SharePremiumMember and a reported value of -82,300,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role https://www.aristongroup.com/role/ChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:SharePremium fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of SharePremium : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/815600CC86D25A205563/2021-12-31/ESEF/NL/0/815600CC86D25A205563-2021-12-31.zip/815600CC86D25A205563-2021-12-31/reports/815600CC86D25A205563-2021-12-31-en.xhtml 640
